name: Cybernetic Eye, Eyeball Display (TL-11)
description:
The eyeball display allows the project of information in readable form in the user's field of vision, very much like a heads-up display (HUD) of a fighter aircraft. It is particularly useful if a computer implant is used, but can is also useful with chronometer or inertial navigation implants. This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
